_sText:
**Enjoy the final version with all bugs, traps fixed and almost 2x better fps in-game! Some players complained of fps drops and lags around specific spots ingame, this has all been fixed.**

The map takes place in a classroom where the CT's spawn. They proceed through some dangerous traps on the hallways and next on the courtyard. The map has nice textures with good lightning.

The map contains of 30 CT spawns and 2 T spawns, 3 secret grenade spots and around 17 traps without the breaking floors.

**At the end, you can pick Bunny hop and Easy.**
If there is anything wrong with the download or anything else, please do not flag but rather comment. :)

> To install the map, put the cstrike folder contained in the download over the old one in you counter strike folder.

**Commenting and rating is more then welcome! Enjoy! :D**
